title: 911 Call After Hitting Deer
subtitle: Intoxicated motorist makes hilarious 911 call after hitting a deer.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An intoxicated motorist hits a deer with his car and, assuming the animal is dead, loads it into his back seat. The deer revives and begins kicking and biting, prompting a hilarious 911 call by the dazed and confused driver.
